original_text: Sheshan gave his daughter to his servant Jarha, to be his wife. She gave birth to a son for him, called Attai.
korean_text: 세산이 딸을 그 종 야르하에게 주어 아내를 삼게 하였더니 그가 그로 말미암아 앗대를 낳고

sentences.original_text: Sheshan gave his daughter to his servant Jarha
sentences.korean_translation: 세산은 그의 딸을 그의 종 야르하에게 주었고

sentences.original_text: She gave birth to a son for him
